name: falling out1234
description:
The goal of the game is to avoid the meteors and reach the high point from the cave, to get out of this planet.

A, D keys to change direction, space bar to move

F key to activate a 2-second force field that pushes the meteors away, but they will come back slowly due to the gravity.

R key to restart the game

If you touched any edges or meteors the game will restart.

you have limited fuel so move wisely.
